roleset.name: take a fancy to

example.name: From BOLT
example.text: Some liberals do n't much cotton to " uppity " blacks like Powell , Thomas and Rice confronting racial discrimination and outright racism and leaving the plantation of dependency on white liberals and achieving the great things they are capable of .

propbank.arg: to " uppity " blacks like Powell , Thomas and Rice confronting racial discrimination and outright racism and leaving the plantation of dependency on white liberals and achieving the great things they are capable of

roleset.note: COTTON-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Comparison to take.17. No VNcls. (from cotton.01-v)
If you see an instance of "cotton_on", that has a slightly different meaning (begin to understand), and will need its own frame. So send it in. (from cotton.01-v)
